embeds.title: Available Commands
embeds.description: Here are some commands you can use:

fields.name: /oldnames
fields.value: Retrieve a user's previous names on Twitter. Stay informed about name changes to identify potential scammers

fields.name: /scan
fields.value: Check a user's profile for suspicious activity or reports in our database. Keep your community safe with this quick verification

fields.name: /report
fields.value: Submit a quick report on a suspicious user. Your report helps expand our database and keep the community safer.

fields.name: /monitor add
fields.value: Track a Twitter account and get real-time updates when they post.(Note: only the server's admin can use this command)

fields.name: /monitor list
fields.value: View all Twitter accounts currently being monitored by your server or by you.

fields.name: How to Register a Report
fields.value: Click the button below to make a report directly in the Exton Discord. Help us keep the space secure by sharing important details about potential scams

fields.name: /scamalert channel
fields.value: Enable real-time scam alerts in your server. Choose the channel and stay ahead of potential threats.

footer.text: If you need more help, contact the server administrator.
